# üåæ Chrono Valley

> **Where Stardew Valley meets SocialFi on Arbitrum.**
> A gamified, pixel-art on-chain community for preserving memories.

![Project Banner](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-Hackathon_Submission-success)
![Network](https://img.shields.io/badge/Network-Arbitrum_Sepolia-blue)
![Tech](https://img.shields.io/badge/Stack-React_|_Solidity_|_Ethers.js-yellow)

## üìñ Introduction

**Chrono Valley** reimagines the Web3 user experience. We believe blockchain tools shouldn't look like stock trading terminals. They should be warm, inviting, and fun.

By combining **Pixel Art aesthetics** with **SocialFi mechanics**, we created a DApp where users don't just "store data"‚Äîthey "plant memories" and "water" (tip) each other's logs.

## ‚ú® Key Features

### üéÆ Immersive RPG Experience
* **"Load Game" Login**: We replaced the boring "Connect Wallet" button with an RPG-style save file loader.
* **Dynamic Day/Night Cycle**: The interface automatically switches between a sunny farm (Day) and a starry night (Night) based on your local time.
* **Pixel-Perfect UI**: Custom `VT323` typography, wood-texture modals, and retro sound effects.

### üíß SocialFi Economy ("Watering")
* **Native Tipping**: Users can click the **"üöø Water"** button on any post to send **0.0001 ETH** directly to the author.
* **Value Social**: This turns likes into actual value, encouraging high-quality content creation on-chain.

### ‚è≥ Dual-Mode Storage
* **Diary Mode**: Instant on-chain logging for daily thoughts.
* **Time Capsule**: Users can lock their messages until a specific future date using our custom-built date picker.

### üèÖ Reputation System
* **Dynamic Badges**: The frontend automatically awards badges (e.g., *Novice*, *Pro*, *TimeLord*) based on the user's on-chain activity count.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack & Contract

* **Frontend**: React, Tailwind CSS, Ethers.js, RainbowKit/WalletConnect logic.
* **Blockchain**: Arbitrum Sepolia Testnet.
* **Deployment**: Smart Contract deployed via Thirdweb.

### üîó Smart Contract Address
`0x1A46b403A29c8cBDA564E1f4B9c6332b8873532f`
[View on Arbiscan](https://sepolia.arbiscan.io/address/0x1A46b403A29c8cBDA564E1f4B9c6332b8873532f)

---

## üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è How to Run

This project is fully decentralized and hosted on GitHub Pages.

### [üöÄ Click Here to Launch Live Demo](https://claim-btc.github.io/Arbitrum-ChronoLog/)

**Local Development:**
1. Clone the repo.
2. Open `index.html` with VS Code Live Server.
3. Enjoy the pixel vibe!
